marklogic.body: There was a suggestion -- by Ian Browne, was it? -- that Cook might be sent to Pawtucket on a rehab assignment for the first couple of weeks until we see how things are shaking out with the rest of the staff. My Anxiety about that is that I don't think we can put him on rehab without putting him on the 40-man roster first -- at which point his escape clause is nullified, but he gets an immediate raise to $1.5M and, once he comes rehab, becomes another of those play-'em-or-waiver-'em Immovable Objects on the active roster. Of course we Reach that crunch anyway on May 1 with the escape clause; but I think it's best to defer these irrevocable commitments as far into the season as possible.
